column5: http://www.gojobs.gov.on.ca/Preview.aspx?JobID=27358  The MNR has posted an Intelligence Investigations Officer opportunity for the Pembrooke area. I guess they are trying to find someone intelligent from Pembroke.  Sounds like an advanced CO position.  Good Luck to any that may be interested.
Intelligence, they will have to look outside the government for that  oh wait, I work for the gov......forget what I said..LOL
remember receiving Welfare does count as having a Government job    I'm just saying.....LOL
